title: Kylie Jenner says Stormi is already 'obsessed with makeup'
text:
Kylie has said her daughter has become ‘obsessed’ with makeup (Picture: Getty Images/Instagram/YouTube)

Kylie Jenner has revealed that her daughter, Stormi, could follow in her footsteps as she seems to already be taking a keen interest in makeup.

The 22-year-old uploaded a long-awaited makeup tutorial to her YouTube channel, and has told her fans that her one-year-old daughter is already ‘obsessed’ with cosmetics and she ‘notices’ whenever she is wearing lipstick.

‘Stormi is actually super into makeup right now. It is amazing,’ she said recently.

‘Every time I’m wearing lipstick she notices. She looks at me and says, “lip lip lip.”’

As she applied her makeup, Kylie also explained that she hasn’t decided when she will start letting her daughter wear cosmetics.

‘I haven’t even thought about when I’m gonna let Stormi wear makeup. I don’t know, I’m just going to see,’ she continued.

‘She might not even want to wear makeup. But honestly, how things are going, this girl is obsessed with makeup. She begs me at this point.’

And this isn’t the first time that Kylie has shared her daughter’s appreciation for beauty products.

Earlier in October, The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star shared a video to Instagram Stories of Stormi playing with one of her lipsticks from her massively lucrative Kylie Cosmetics range.

‘Stormi is testing out Charm [Kylie Cosmetics liquid lipstick] for you guys,’ Kylie said to the camera, as her daughter can be seen with a trail of lipstick across her mouth, as she attempts to apply it to her mother’s lips.

However, the toddler is clearly having too much fun with the lipstick, as she can be seen trying to put it into Kylie’s mouth.

‘Only on my lips!’ Kylie replied.

And as we can see Stormi put the lipstick into her own mouth, Kylie tells her child it’s about time that the makeup was removed from her face.

‘Okay girl, we gotta take that off, we gotta take it off,’ she says, as Stormi can be seen walking away.

‘Oh my goodness, she really is my daughter,’ Kylie later exclaims.

Ah, kids.
